content:
I recently found a blog post which explains how to embed audio files with Plyr.io and a Shortcode in Hugo.
I implemented hls.js on top of it.
So here’s the result: it plays the public german channel SWR3 using its HLS stream. You can rewind the live footage up to 2 hours.
